actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the designation of the 7-day period beginning June 23, 1975, and ending June 29, 1975, as "National Amateur Radio Week".

summary.text: Authorizes the designation of the June 23, 1975, through June 29, 1975, as "National Amateur Radio Week" in recognition of the many contributions of amateur radio operators.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the designation of the 7-day period beginning June 23, 1975, and ending June 29, 1975, as "National Amateur Radio Week".
